573310.name: Cash_Out Demo
573310.description:
Cash_Out is a randomly generated top down shooter that blends stealth and action to keep the gameplay moving. Build up your character with career mode, or jump right into the game with quickplay. Choose your class, stats and skills to customize your character to your playstyle. While in raids pick up items, weapons and clothing to give yourself the edge while raiding!

This beta contains a small part of the full game for you to try out...

  • Try a small quickplay raid in the industrial level set!
  • Pick one of 6 classes and try 2 of the class skills and 4 of the global skills!
  • Try out 7 of the clothing sets currently in the full game!
  • Try out 13 of the items currently in the full game!
  • Try out procedurally generated weapons, or 12 of the unique weapons currently in the full game!
